page.title: 09Home Life
page.content: At 7.30a.m. I wash and put on my school uniform....a white shirt, tank top(a sleeveless jumper),grey trousers,red tie,white socks and black shoes.I eat my breakfast consisting of cornflakes and a drink.For 20 minutes I read or listen to the radio,then I leave for school on my bike.I spend 7 hours at school after which I visit my friend.I return for tea and watch television until 10.00p.m.-then I go to bed. Our kitchen is 3 metres square.We have an electric cooker containing a grill, an oven,and 4 hot rings.A refrigerator keeps food fresh,while the freezer can store foo for several months.A washing machine cleans clothes using soap and hot water.The micro wave oven cooks food very quickly and saves energy.The majority of meals are eaten in the kitchen.(by Clevedon Comprehensive)
